activities: BVC collects personally-identifiable information on certain areas of the Site when users register, request publications or other information, sign up for conferences and events, and participate in cultural assessments. The personally-identifiable information collected may consist of information that users provide, such as names, mailing addresses, e-mail addresses, telephone and fax numbers, and any other personally-identifiable information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Consumer complaints will generally be escalated internally to BVC's management, who will consult with legal representation on appropriate response or action depending on the facts at issue. In the event that BVC is unable to resolve a complaint to the consumer's satisfaction, BVC will direct the consumer to contact local authoritative bodies, including the European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs).
